column17:
This coffee pot from Nirlon is stylish and sleek. It has a capacity of 600ml of hot liquid and is odourless and leak proof. It is crafted of stainless steel which makes this pot durable and enhances longevity.

Features
  • Type: Coffee Pot
  • Colour: Silver
  • Material: Stainless Steel
  • Pattern: Solid
  • Capacity (Capacity in ml): 600
  • Contents: 1 piece coffee pot
  • Other Features: Odourless Leak proof

Care Tips
Clean with a soft sponge and normal detergent
Do not use harsh chemicals or products to avoid scratches
Remove unwanted marks by rubbing the utensils with lemon
Ensure that the utensil is dried thoroughly before storing away
